Class describing information about an item for sale in a store, such as price, description and stock

Non-default constructor for objects of class RetailItem, requires params

Parameters:
inputItemDescription - Short description of retail item for sale
inputItemPriceInCAD - Retail price of item in Canadian dollars
inputIsInDemand - Tells us whether or not the item is in demand, true or false
inputNumberOfUnitsInStock - How many physical units are in stock in our inventory
